mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_node_inspire ( public_key, address, name, status, current_stake, node_release_inspire, node_release_inspire_rate, user_release_inspire, user_release_inspire_rate, node_commission_inspire, node_commission_inspire_rate, user_commission_inspire, user_commission_inspire_rate, node_foundation_inspire, node_foundation_inspire_rate, user_foundation_inspire, user_foundation_inspire_rate) values
(#{item.publicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.currentStake,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.nodeReleaseInspire,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.nodeReleaseInspireRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userReleaseInspire,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.userReleaseInspireRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nodeCommissionInspire,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.nodeCommissionInspireRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userCommissionInspire,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.userCommissionInspireRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nodeFoundationInspire,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.nodeFoundationInspireRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userFoundationInspire,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.userFoundationInspireRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
